靲字的基本解释

靲
qín
皮制的鞋（一说皮制鞋的带子）。
竹篾：“幂用疏布，久之，系用靲。”

靲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qín］
［《廣韻》巨金切，平侵，羣。］
亦作“1”。
(1)皮制鞋带。
(2)竹篾。

靲字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　靲； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1385第14
【唐韻】巨今切【集韻】渠金切，?音琴。【說文】鞮也。【玉篇】靲鞻也。【廣韻】靲鞻，四夷樂也。　又【集韻】居吟切，音今。又其淹切，音箝。義?同。　又巨禁切，音?。鞮帶也，束物韋也。　又其闇切。竹䈼也。【儀禮·士喪禮】幂用疏布，久之繫用靲。【註】竹䈼也。

靲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
靲字的起名意思

暂无。

靲
Basic explanation of words
靲
qín
Leather shoes (for example, leather shoe straps).
Bamboo strips: "Sparse cloth is used for the power, and for a long time, it is used for the tie."
靲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qín］
["Guangyun" giant gold cut, flat invasion, group. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Leather shoelaces.
(2) Bamboo strips.
靲

【Tang Yun】Ju Jinqie 【Jiyun】Qu Jinqie, sound piano. [Said the text] Yan Ye. [Jade articles] The 靲鞻 also. [Guang Yun] Dao, Siyi music also.　[Jiyun] Juyinqie, sound today. And its drowned cut, sound clamp. Righteous? Same.　It's forbidden to cut again, sound?. Mota belt is also, Shuwu Wei is also.　It's secretly cut again. Takeya also. [Rituals and Funerals] Use sparse cloth for power, and 靲 for a long time. [Note] Takeya also.
